Attribute.Name: ContainerNo
Attribute.Description: ContainerNo for which this API could successfully get a Tracking Number.

Attribute.Name: PierbridgeLabelURL
Attribute.Description: Publishes the Pierbridge Label URL if populated in the Pierbrdige Server Response XML.

Attribute.Name: ShipmentContainerKey
Attribute.Description: ShipmentContainerKey for which this API could successfully get a Tracking Number.

Attribute.Name: PierbridgeReturnLabelURL
Attribute.Description: Publishes the Pierbridge Return Label URL if populated in the Pierbrdige Server Response XML.

Attribute.Name: ReturnPrintBuffer
Attribute.Description: Label print buffer of the return label that is returned by Yantra Carrier Server if WMS chooses to print the label by itself. WMS can use this buffer only using Sterling Pierbridge Adaptor.

Attribute.Name: ContainerNo
Attribute.Description: ContainerNo for a Tracking Number could not be fetched because of various reasons like invalid address, invalid carrier service etc.

Attribute.Name: ShipmentContainerKey
Attribute.Description: ShipmentContainerKey for which this API failed to get a Tracking Number.

Attribute.Name: StackTrace
Attribute.Description: Stack trace of the error for troubleshooting.
